content:
# elizaos/eliza Daily Update (Jan 14, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
Today, development focused on a new pull request to refactor domain stores within the `plugin-sql` module. Two new issues were opened, one detailing a reflection evaluator failure and another providing a guide for AI agent payment implementation.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
A new pull request, [#6366](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6366), was opened to refactor the `plugin-sql` module by extracting domain stores from `BaseDrizzleAdapter`.

## CLOSED ISSUES

## NEW ISSUES
### Reflection Evaluator Failure
A new issue, [#6364](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6364), was reported regarding a "Reflection evaluator fails with 'Entity not found'" error when `UPDATE_CONTACT` is called without `ensureConnection()` being invoked first. The issue includes logs and a proposed fix.

### AI Agent Payment Implementation Guide
A new issue, [#6365](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6365), was opened to share a comprehensive guide on autonomous AI agent payments using Circle and Coinbase APIs, based on a live marketplace with over 25 active wallets.

## ACTIVE ISSUES
